statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock > 50
SELECT product_name FROM InventoryLevels WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT current_stock, minimum_threshold FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < minimum_threshold
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT product_name, minimum_threshold FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < minimum_threshold;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM InventoryLevels WHERE product_id IN (1, 5, 7);
SELECT SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM InventoryLevels;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, min_stock_threshold FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name = 'Apples';
SELECT * FROM reorder_notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM reorder_notifications WHERE notification_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock AS stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE min_stock_threshold < 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE min_stock_threshold <= 20 AND product_name LIKE '%chair%' ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock, min_stock_threshold FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name='Table' OR current_stock < 5 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;

SELECT id, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM reorder_notifications WHERE notification_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND notification_message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY notification_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, log_description, timestamp FROM inventory_logs WHERE CAST(timestamp AS DATE) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM reorder_notifications WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > reorder_threshold ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM reorder_notifications WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY notification_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_description, timestamp FROM inventory_logs WHERE product_id IN (SELECT id FROM inventory WHERE quantity < reorder_threshold) ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT product_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_notifications FROM inventory JOIN reorder_notifications ON inventory.id = reorder_notifications.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_notifications > 5 ORDER BY total_notifications DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level < minimum_threshold;
SELECT item_name, log_description FROM inventory_items INNER JOIN inventory_logs ON inventory_items.item_id = inventory_logs.item_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, notification_message, notification_date FROM inventory_items INNER JOIN reorder_notifications ON inventory_items.item_id = reorder_notifications.item_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE minimum_threshold < 10
SELECT notification_message, notification_date FROM reorder_notifications WHERE notification_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name, user_email
SELECT item_id, log_description, log_date FROM inventory_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_threshold FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC, current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_threshold FROM products WHERE current_stock < minimum_threshold;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_threshold FROM products WHERE product_id = 5 OR product_id = 7;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
